name: SOAKED
description:
Drain the water out of the sewer. Do not touch the ghosts, or they will kill 
you. They are invisible. Be guided by the sound they make. sometimes you can 
hear the sound of one of them, but this one is on the other side of the wall. 
So beware. Either you risk taking a fright or looking for another route. 
Thank you for acquiring. Enjoy the game and enjoy the DLCs.
